metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15999 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.Description:
Heap buffer overflow in Freetype in Google Chrome prior to 86.0.4240.111allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15999` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.10.2+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libfreetype6 - 2.10.2+dfsg-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.2+dfsg-3ubuntu1').
